description: Grimsby Town move up to fifth place with a comfortable win over League Two promotion rivals Port Vale
title: Grimsby Town 3-0 Port Vale
title_page: Grimsby Town 3-0 Port Vale - BBC Sport
maintext:
Grimsby Town have won five of their last seven Football League games against Port Vale (D1 L1), keeping a clean sheet in three of the last five such games.
Port Vale have lost each of their last three away games against Grimsby Town in the Football League, last losing four successive such games in February 1899 (run of five).
Grimsby Town have won just two of their last nine final Football League games of the year (D3 L4), though did win their last such fixture 3-0 against Salford City last year.
Port Vale are winless on each of the last four occasions their final Football League game of a year has been away from home (D1 L3).
